Implementable Solutions

We at Agranee Solutions dedicate our Highly Technical resources to meet all your Information Technology related needs. We specialize in delivering all kinds of projects ranging from small desktop applications to huge enterprise applications.

Our structured client focused approach ensures your business and market needs are met in an efficient and candid manner. Upon initial contact, we perform a needs analysis, ensuring we fully understand your business needs.

We will review your business requirements and translate them into functional and non-functional system requirements. The designing, development, testing, user acceptance phases of software evolution will iterate until our clients are fully satisfied.
Web Develoment Services

Web presence is not only the need of today but a must have tool to reach out to your clients. We provide complete range of cutting-edge and highly reliable custom web development services to empower your business to reach out to customers who rely heavily on Internet to find vendors and services.

Our team focus not only on the creation of the application but also on the structure, strategy and design of the project. Our emphasis on the user interface designs sets us apart from merely being a web design company. We not only give you a higly attractive web design but we also build solid features, so that you can services your clients in much more efficient way. Our company offers our clients with business-centric set of web design.

• Custom Web Development
  • Web Application Development
  • E-Business Solutions
  • Enterprise Portal Development
  • Content Management Systems ((Joomla, WordPress, OSCommerce,Drupal)
Software Develoment Services

AGRANEE's cross-industry, offshore software development services help you craft a vision for your organization and then implement a result-oriented technology framework that will turn that vision into reality.

Our technical team is well trained and have many years of expertise to handle various Software Development platforms and methodologies. We have a well trained and experienced team for the below mentioned technologies:

• Software Outsourcing @ AGRANEE
  • Custom Software Development
  • Software Migration and Re-engineering
  • Software Testing Services
Mobile / Application Development
Our mobile & application development services help you address evolving market challenges by defining, designing and building applications tailored to meet your specific business requirements.

• Mobile Application Development
  • Enterprise Mobility Solutions
  • Custom Application Development
  • Enterprise Application Development
  • Application Maintenance Services
Search Engine Optimization

Give your business an extra edge using search engine optimization. SEO or Search Engine Optimization is the process of optimizing the website to bring the websites position on the higher ranks on search engine results pages. Our SEO Package includes:

• Web Market Competition Analysis
  • The Best Keyword Research
  • Title Tag and META Tags Optimization
  • XML Sitemap Creation
  • Google Analytics Reporting
  • On-site content planning
  • Social bookmarking
  • Blog commenting
  • Article syndication

Through our in-depth knowledge and years of experience in On-Site and Off-Site optimization, SEO strategy making and result-oriented approach, we ensure you the best services for your website promotion. We provide all SEO services includingSEM (Search Engine Marketing) and SMO (Social Media Optimization). You can also view ourSEO Pakages Plans (On-Page & Off-Page) for more information.

AGRANEE SOLUTIONS is an established software development company with an enviable & proven track-record engaged in providing application development services, technology consulting and IT outsourcing solutions to clients worldwide.

We are a company hoping to grow in software and IT services. Our vision is to become technology leader and one of the best IT service providers by developing best-of-its-class solutions, by developing long term relations with our clients and by innovation and implementation of our innovative solutions that facilitate faster, smarter and continuous growth of our clients.

Our Management Team has decades of combined Technical as well as Management experience in different domains and with different roles. They have rich experience in working with all kind of companies ranging from start-ups to Billion Dollar Multinationals like IBM, Boeing, Telus,Yahoo, Adobe, Dropbox and many more.
Our Vision is to help people and corporations around the globe with their solutions. We believe in making our employees happy, which results in even happier clients.
At AGRANEE, we believe in offering much more than just a job; we strive to give you a full-fledged growing career.

If you have talent, we want you to be a part of our team. AGRANEE recognizes that even technology companies are people businesses, and that our greatest assets are our employees. We operate a lean but brilliant team, where innovation and creativity are encouraged and rewarded. Working with leading-edge technology, we have built a culture of collaboration, learning and fun, with the entire organization united behind the success of our product.
To apply the given below positions, please send your resume at jobs@agranee.com with specific position.

Positions : 6
Experience : 1-3 years
Salary :$26 per hour for 35 hours per week
Location : Vancouver, Canada
Job Description : Agranee Solutions Ltd is looking for Full Stack Java/Web Developers to join our product team responsible for designing and developing web applications. As a key member of our team, you'll be responsible for the creative execution of new features and technology, designing and developing our web-based products.
Mandatory Skills

• Hands on experience with client-side development of web applications, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript in addition to advanced knowledge of web development techniques and knowledge of Java enterprise application development
  • Experience with object-oriented JavaScript concepts and frameworks (including MVC patterns, JQuery and one of the following: Angular, Angular 2 and React)
  • Knowledge of Data Structures in JavaScript
  • Experience with JavaScript Testing best practices and unit testing, including knowledge of Jasmine or PhantomJS or other
  • Strong understanding of Java programming language and best practices
  • Travel to client locations to install intranet settings and educate clients on day to day operations.
  • Experience with Java based web presentation frameworks (i.e. JSP’s, JSF, other)
  • Experience with Object-Oriented and Service-Oriented Architecture, applications design, object modeling and data modelling
  • Version control systems (SVN,Git) and continuous integration systems (Bamboo, Jenkins)
  • Highly developed analytical, problem solving, organizational and time management skills
  • Experience working with agile/scrum software development methodology
  • Develops cross platform desktop, mobile responsive web sites.
  • Develops cross platform mobile responsive emails.
  • Accurately translate designs from creative department to HTML/CSS.
  • Experiment with and evaluate new technologies.

• Education: Diploma/Degree in Computer Science.
  • Experience: 3+ year experience developing HTML-based web content, JavaScript, CSS and Java Programming Language
  • Other: Must be able to read, write and speak English and work as part of a team and supervise them if required.

Positions : 1
Experience : 3+ years
Salary : As per Market Standard
Location : Toronto, Canada
Job Description : Agranee Solutions is looking for a candidate to join our product team responsible for designing and building core components of our Andriod/iOS Applications. As a key member of our team, you'll be responsible for the creative execution of new features in our undrergoing product development.
It is essential that you have a strong working knowledge of Andriod/iOS to develop world class Applications. A familiarity with 2D/3D graphics for user interaction purposes is preferred.
This is a senior level position for mobile technology driven team.
Mandatory Skills

• Demonstrated experience leading a technical team.
  • Experience developing technical architecture recommendations / diagrams.
  • Experience working in a fast-paced, high demand environment.
  • Proficiency with Java/J2EE and/or Objective C/Swift
  • Proficiency with Designing, Creating and deploying Web services in environment like AWS and EC2
  • Broad range of app experiences, and well versed in market trends and styles
  • Knowledge of object oriented analysis and design.
  • Experience in commercial software development with at least 3 years in mobile technology.
  • University degree in software engineering or equivalent experience

Job Description : Agranee Solutions has a strong QA team who are responsible for network server, endpoint, and UI/application testing, and are looking for 2 new Senior Test Engineers who are experienced in Agile Testing. The successful candidates will work to prevent delays that result from system bugs and errors being caught late in the development cycle.
This is a senior level position for mobile technology driven team.
Our ideal candidates will have 2-3 years hands-on experience with testing hardware, software and firmware components and an undergraduate degree in Computer Science, or equivalent. You also bring at least 2 years experience in each of the following:
Mandatory Skills

• Linux development environment experience.
  • Testing experience in an Agile development environment.
  • Proficiency with Java/J2EE or similar Object Oritend Programming Languages.
  • Proficiency with Designing, Creating and deploying Web services in environment like AWS and EC2
  • Broad range of Domain experiences, and well versed in market trends and styles
  • Knowledge of object oriented analysis and design.
  • University degree in software engineering or equivalent experience
